<properties pageTitle="49e5b6f3-4609-4bd6-8761-e6cb07ae0528" description="6842ad84-d363-4cf5-8dd7-0c7c65d2fdb6" services="storage" documentationCenter="ruby" authors="tfitzmac" manager="wpickett" editor=""/>

LinkItem.internal_link_text: Create a Ruby application on Azure
Create a Ruby application on Azure

MarkdownBlockBase.code_block: Azure.config.storage_account_name = "<your azure storage account>" Azure.config.storage_access_key = "<your azure storage access key>"
azure_blob_service = Azure::BlobService.new begin container = azure_blob_service.create_container("test-container") rescue puts $! end
content = File.open("test.png", "rb") { |file| file.read } blob = azure_blob_service.create_block_blob(container.name, "image-blob", content) puts blob.name
containers = azure_blob_service.list_containers() containers.each do |container| blobs = azure_blob_service.list_blobs(container.name) blobs.each do |blob| puts blob.name end end
